The European Union (not Europe!) is hell-bent on destroying Europe but they'll have to deal with a few pesky things that are in the way, like the Internet to prevent an uprising against the EU and all other supranational organizations that do not have the people's best interest at heart.

>Don't implement the filter at all

Copyright filters aren't the only thing ZeroNet would have to comply with but can't. "Terrorist content" will have to be removed **within an hour** resulting in another censorship tool.
